name: (2016SP) Wander
description:
Wander

(Note; there is no pause or quit function; you will need to use Alt+F4 or the Task Manager to quit the game.)

This was a university-level student project, so please keep that in mind when leaving comments. Friendly, constructive feedback is of immense value to help our teams become more effective developers! We appreciate your time and attention as a player!
